item.description:
The mostly French concert includes works by Lully, Charpentier, and Rameau, among others. Performed on period instruments.

General admission $10, students $5. Buy your tickets at the door on the night of the concert.

Please keep your RSVP updated. If you say that you're coming and later find out that you won't make it after all, please change your RSVP.

When I posted this event on the website, I also sent an email to everyone in the group. The email has details about location, parking, composers, etc. If you'd like me to send it to you again, use the link next to "Who's hosting?"
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send more details to people who say they are coming.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Concert of French Baroque
